lyrics.stanza: On His Father's throne is seated Christ the Lord, the living One! All His toil on earth completed, All His work for sinners done. In the glory, in the glory, See Him—God's eternal Son!
Every knee shall bow before Him, Every tongue confess His name, Ransomed myriads shall adore Him, Who endured the sinner's shame! From the glory, from the glory, God doth now His worth proclaim.
Son of Man, His incarnation Opened first the tale of grace; Son of Man, in new creation Leader of a chosen race! Well may glory, well may glory, Give to Him the honored place!
